TestCase.name: testMaxWithRetractOptimizeWithLocalGlobal
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, MAX(max$0) AS EXPR$1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, MAX(a3) AS max$0, COUNT_RETRACT(*) AS count$1], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a1, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- StreamExecGlobalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1, a2], select=[a1, a2, MAX(max$0) AS a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a1, a2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecLocalGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1, a2], select=[a1, a2, MAX(a3) AS max$0], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecWatermarkAssigner(fields=[[a1, a2, a3]], rowtimeField=[null], watermarkOffset=[0], miniBatchInterval=[Proctime, 100ms], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testMinCanNotOptimize
TestCase.Resource: StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1], select=[a1, MIN_RETRACT(a3) AS EXPR$1], updateAsRetraction=[false], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a1]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- StreamExecCalc(select=[a1, a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- StreamExecGroupAggregate(groupBy=[a1, a2], select=[a1, a2, MAX(a3) AS a3], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[AccRetract]) +- StreamExecExchange(distribution=[hash[a1, a2]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc]) +- StreamExecDataStreamScan(table=[[builtin, default, _DataStreamTable_0]], updateAsRetraction=[true], accMode=[Acc])

TestCase.name: testMinWithRetractOptimizeWithLocalGlobal
